name: gun of fight
description: a sheriff  is about to arrest an outlaw but the outlaw wont go down with out a fight and now its a stand off. controls sheriff press up arrow to go up press down arrow to go down press left arrow to go left and press right arrow to go right press ctrl to shoot hold 7 to aim down hold 9 to aim up . outlaw press w to go up press s to go down press a to go left and press d to go right press space bare to shoot press  e  to aim down press q to aim up.
